Project Manager NTT DATA Austin TX 2016 to 2018 Provide comprehensive business analysis and IT project management services for a leading systems integration company with responsibility for supporting a 190MM onsite IT support services contract with the Texas Department of Transportation Created a data aggregator tool that automated the process for analyzing and comparing disparate data sources across multiple systems eliminating the need for a half fulltime employee position establishing a repeatable process used divisionwide and reducing the time required for such analysis from five days per month to less than 10 hours Coordinate with server owners to determine progress toward goals and deliver a monthly exemptions report relating to the decommissioning of endoflife servers as part of a major project to reduce vulnerabilities in the clients environment Streamlined data aggregation and analysis processes by identifying inefficiencies and designing Excelbased solutions that automated the datapulling process reducing a 30day reporting lag to a fiveday process Reduced server vulnerabilities by 25 in less than a year and workstation vulnerabilities by 42 over eight months by providing business intelligence through creation of an Excel dashboard and by enabling prioritization of critical tasks Business Analyst Business Intelligence Solutions Charles Schwab Austin TX 2015 to 2016 Provide comprehensive business analysis for the Austin office of the international investment firm with responsibility for researching analyzing proposing and sourcing a variety of software solutions to meet specific business needs Recommended and began implementation of Tableau to create visual data for senior leadership saving over 40000 compared to the previous solution and achieving a 98 reduction in time spent on reporting Created a Tableau dashboard for the My Retirement Progress product filling a void in reporting functionality for hundreds of potential total users and allowing for customizable clientfocused reporting based on updated Excel data Gathered requirements from multiple stakeholders on the Tableau dashboard project with responsibility for adjusting features and project scope based on constant feedback resetting customer expectations and communicating functionality requirements to the developer at all phases of development Improved data accessibility and usability by working with technology partners to create stored procedures to replace a large Excelbased data source Provide comprehensive administrative and technical support for Salesforcecom and serve as first point of contact for all issues relating to data within the CRM Independent Consultant Independent Consultant Austin TX 2012 to 2015 Initiated planned and implemented comprehensive business analysis projects for B2B clients across the Austin area including process analysis and improvement projects and creation of workflow diagrams for asis and tobe analysis Created a WordPress site for an artists online retail store based on the clients specific needs and goals configuring a solution that allowed customers to search for art based on style and make purchases directly on the site significantly improving the clients website traffic and ecommerce capabilities Significantly improved a clients online marketing by developing landing pages for new sales prospects configuring the clients CRM to capture lead contact information for use in future email marketing Operations Analyst FUJIFILM SonoSite Inc Bothell WA 2010 to 2012 Managed all aspects of sales order project management for the Seattlearea producer of sonogram imaging devices including providing quotations purchase orders vendor management and reporting Operations Analyst Allied Fire
